Title: Adds provisions to grand larceny in the third degree relating to victims 65 years of age or older
Summary: Provides that when property, regardless of its nature and value, is taken from the person of another and the victim is 65 years of age or older or such property is obtained by extortion and the victim is 65 years of age or older, such crimes shall be grand larceny in the third degree and subject to a class D felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to grand larceny in the third degree of a person who is 65 years of age or older
